tool_description: Identifies and extracts legal entities such as law firms, courts, judges, case parties, and other legal-specific entities from document text using specialized legal NLP models.

document_text.description: Text content to analyze for legal entity recognition

entity_types.description: Types of legal entities to identify and extract

case_jurisdiction.description: Legal jurisdiction context for improved entity recognition

error_messages: Document text too short: Text must contain at least 50 words for reliable entity recognition.
Invalid entity types: All entity_types must be from the supported list of legal entity categories.
Jurisdiction not recognized: The specified case_jurisdiction is not in the supported jurisdiction list.
usage: Provide document_text for entity analysis. Specify entity_types to focus on particular categories, and add case_jurisdiction for context-aware recognition. Returns identified entities with their types and positions.

entities_found.description: List of unique entities identified in the document

entity_types.description: Corresponding entity types for each found entity

entity_frequencies.description: Number of times each entity appears in the document

total_entities.description: Total count of all entity mentions found
